column4: anyone here have any experience configuring retail point of sale systems on linux?
what POS system are you working with?
I've tried about 10 different applications and don't like any so far
what are you trying to do? is this app for restaurants, etc?
nope i'm opening a retail store
well on windows i've only tried openbravo
i'm assuming you need to do credit card processing?
yes i need credit cards, inventories, etc
for me i just called up one of these credit card processing companies and they gave me the libraries to program the credit card processing stuff
then you can hire a programmer to program the rest of your requirements
yeah but about 99% of the people i've talked to are windows only
umm let's take this offline because if you can tell me some info like average, high, low
no but i'm heavily involved with CC transactions
i'm involved with mobile transactions i.e. NY taxi cabs
